content: this pattern makes an adorable little pumpkin bear that is perfect for autumn or halloween decor this pattern makes a small bear that is about 6 5 inches tall materials needed - 3 75mm crochet hook - worsted weight yarn in the colors of your choice i used red-heart super-saver for this project - 12mm safety eyes - fiber fill -stitch markers - yarn needle - scissors - embroidery thread - pins abbreviations - magic_ring- magic_ring - st- stitch - single_crochet- single_crochet - increase- increase - decrease- decrease -blo- back loops only
